## Week 13 - Lab 10:  Tip Percentages

\setstretch{1}

### Learning objectives

```{r}
tips <- read.csv("data/happyface.csv")

tips %>%  # Data set piped into...
  ggplot(aes(y = TipPct, x = Message))+  # Identify variables
  geom_boxplot()+  # Tell it to make a box plot
  labs(title = "xx",  # Title
       x = "Message",    # x-axis label
       y = "TipPct")  # y-axis label
```
